dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 1023 IH: To repeal section 134 of the Clean Air Act, relating to the greenhouse gas reduction fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Palmer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal section 134 of the Clean Air Act, relating to the greenhouse gas reduction fund.

section.header: Repeal of Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund

subsection.text: Section 134 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7434)(relating to the greenhouse gas reduction fund) is repealed.
The unobligated balance of any amounts made available under section 134 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7434)(as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of this Act) is rescinded.
Section 60103 of Public Law 117â€“169 (relating to the greenhouse gas reduction fund) is repealed.
